Reviews.Title: A decent phone for a new smartphone consumer
Reviews.Author: Shelia A. Winston
Reviews.Content: This is a great starter phone for somebody new to the smartphone era. It is thin and sleek and can fit into any pocket or purse with ease. It has a smooth feel to it when it is in your hand and has great finger access, with maneuvering to all the accessible buttons.Will all that said, a few things about the phone need to be commented on. The screen is not worthwhile, as you have to press pretty hard to swipe or select an on-screen command. The phone is beyond difficult to conduct a text-message with, as you will constantly push the correct key, only for the phone to tell give you a different. If you can deal with the texting and screen than this would be a great starter phone for you.

Reviews.Title: It's Cool
Reviews.Author: Kanisha
Reviews.Content: The phone messes up here and there. It's a great phone for someone whose phone is messed up and about to get an upgrade. I wouldn't want this phone 6 months, can't wait to get my upgrade.

Reviews.Title: BAD ESN
Reviews.Author: rachel kennedy
Reviews.Content: This phone is supposed to be a sprint ready phone.  I contacted Sprint, and after a full week of them attempting to use the ESN, The ticket was denied as an already active ESN.

Reviews.Title: Defected
Reviews.Author: Alicia Alston
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a backup phone. When it came I was so happy but once I used the phone I noticed that it had a buzzing sound while talking on the phone. I have to keep my phone on vibrate for work one day I was at my desk I heard it buzzing so I had to put it on silent. I contacted the seller and they told me to send it back at my expense, I just tossed it to much trouble.

Reviews.Title: Suckie phone!!
Reviews.Author: 1103carl
Reviews.Content: The Phone does all kinds of things on its own. You dial the number 2 the phone dials 0 and so on. I bought the phone for my mother and she hates the phone. Wish I would have returned it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Runner
Reviews.Content: Great phone for so little and it was shipped fast too.This is a win win product.and you don't need a long contract to get this great phone.

Reviews.Title: Zio
Reviews.Author: patricia
Reviews.Content: I give it a 3 because of phone feature. Zio is good for talking and receiving e-mail. Need more feature need a better typing pad.
